headline: QUALMETRICS HYGROTHERMOGRAPH
categories.lvl1: Laboratory Equipment > Other Scientific and Laboratory Equipment
specstable:
Manufacturer Quailmetrics
Model 5021
Description Hygrothermograph
Other Information
  • Measurements: Temperature and Humidity
  • Temperture Sensor: Aged Bimetal Strip
  • Span: 60°C, 110°F (adjustable)
  • Accuracy: ±1%
  • Graduations: 1°C, 2°F
  • Humidity Sensor: Hair Bundle
  • Range: 0-100% RH
  • Accuracy: ±1% mid-scale, ±3% extremes
  • Graduations: 1%
  • Chart size: 7" H x 11" L (178 mm x 280 mm
  • Clock type: 1.5 Vdc battery-operated (2 AA cells)
  • Drum rotation: 1 day (26 hrs), 7 days (176 hrs), or 31 days, switch selectable
  • Pen type: Cartridge
    Charts and pens(not included)available from Nova lynx 530-823-7185
Condition Very Good
Exterior Dimensions
Width 6.000 in (15.2 cm)
Depth 12.500 in (31.8 cm)
Height 11.500 in (29.2 cm)
Weight 10 lb (5 kg)
